title: Beltrunner-Tie Bomber Varient
wikitext:
[[File:Beltrunner-Tie-Bomber-Varient.jpg|thumb|500px]] '''Craft''': Modified SFS TIE Bomber
'''Type''': Refurbished externally-shielded asteroid runner
'''Scale''': Starfighter
'''Length''': 7.8 meters
'''Skill''': SF piloting: TIE
'''Crew''': 1
'''Crew Skill''': SF piloting 4D
'''Passengers''': 1
'''Cargo Capacity''': 10 metric tons (bomb bay)
'''Consumables''': 5 days
'''Hyperdrive Multiplier''': x2
'''Nav Computer''': Limited (4 jumps)
'''Maneuverability''': 2D+2
'''Space''': 9
'''Atmosphere''': 415; 1200 kmh
'''Hull''': 1D+2
'''Shields''': Externally provided - see [[Belt-Runner I]]
'''Sensors''': *Passive: 10/1D *Search: 20/2D *Scan: 35/3D *Focus: 3/4D '''Weapons: '''None '''Capsule''': This craft has repulsorlift generators which allow it to bounce off of asteroids when activated.This craft is a refitted TIE Bomber used in Lando Calrissian's asteroid belt course. It can bounce off of asteroids as well as receive shield transmissions from Belt-Runner I.
